Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Thulsa's draelkar pylons are affecting more than just the wendigos. We have to keep force parity at all costs.

Kill the {@LinkCreature:51#2021#snowfield arachnens} and {@LinkCreature:51#2031#frostwalker sabertooths}.

Report to Kenzar at Icebase Defiance when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation! Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
